rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Living Area
rooms.description: This open-plan area serves as a transitional space that leads to the living area and home theater, ensuring seamless flow and natural ventilation. Vastu guidelines are considered with an east-facing entrance.

rooms.name: Kitchen & Dining Area
rooms.description: Compact yet efficient kitchen integrated with dining space. The design focuses on natural light from windows placed in accordance to Vastu principles, ensuring energy efficiency and a modern Mediterranean style.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom & Ensuite Bathroom
rooms.description: Designed with privacy and comfort in mind, this space features ample natural light from strategically placed windows on the south side to maintain balance as per Vastu. The ensuite bathroom is conveniently accessible.

rooms.name: Studio Area
rooms.description: An open studio designed for work or creative activities, featuring flexible space usage and abundant natural light. The layout respects the irregular plot shape while maintaining a Mediterranean farmhouse aesthetic.

rooms.name: Home Theater & Multipurpose Room
rooms.description: A dedicated space for entertainment with built-in seating and optimized acoustics, designed to be quiet yet flexible. The room is positioned away from the main living areas to minimize noise interference while still receiving ample natural light through side windows.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: A compact gym area tailored for home workouts, incorporating modern equipment storage solutions and sufficient ventilation. It is designed with Vastu principles in mind to support personal energy flow.

openings.name: Front Door
openings.description: The main entrance door placed on the eastern side, aligning with Vastu for auspicious entry of light and positive energy.

openings.name: Windows
openings.description: Large windows across various rooms ensuring maximum natural light and cross ventilation. Windows are strategically located to adhere to local building norms while enhancing energy efficiency.

openings.name: Balcony Access
openings.description: Provides access to the large garden, allowing residents to enjoy outdoor space directly from the living area and studio, ensuring a seamless indoor-outdoor connection in line with Mediterranean farmhouse design.

vastu_considerations.major_rooms_positioning: South facing for privacy and energy balance.
vastu_considerations.light_and_ventilation: Emphasis on large windows, cross ventilation, and open space design.

budget_considerations.materials: Cost-effective materials that maintain Mediterranean farmhouse aesthetics such as reclaimed wood and locally sourced stone.
budget_considerations.design_efficiency: Open-plan layout reduces construction costs while maximizing functionality across irregular plot shape.
